data.title: Grady Memorial Hospital
data.meta_description: Grady Hospital is Atlanta’s only ACS-verified Level I trauma center, only adult and pediatric burn center, and advanced comprehensive stroke center.
data.text:
Welcome to Grady

Since Grady first opened in 1892, we have continually reinvented ourselves to meet the region’s evolving medical needs.

Whatever the need, Grady fulfills it – even as we continue to raise the bar for medical care in the region. The world’s leading physicians come to Grady to practice here, teach here and save patients whose conditions are beyond the capabilities of other hospitals.

Make an Appointment

Thanks for choosing Grady. There are a few ways to make your next appointment. You can schedule an in-person visit, video visit, or screening mammogram online or call our scheduling center at (404) 616-1000. Check out our Make An Appointment page for complete details.

If you are an existing Grady patient and have a MyChart account, visit MyChart to request your appointment online.

Public Transportation

MARTA offers two options to access Grady Health System’s main campus. MARTA’s bus route options do change, please check MARTA’s website (itsmarta.com) for complete information.

Option #1: Rail Take MARTA’s East-West rail line to stop E1 — Georgia State Station. From the station, walk two blocks north on Piedmont Avenue. Turn right onto Gilmer Street. Walk one block east on Gilmer, to Jesse Hill Jr. Drive.

Option #2: Bus Take MARTA bus Route 99 which passes in front of Grady Memorial Hospital and puts you directly onto the Health System campus.

Parking

JESSE HILL JR DRIVE CLOSURE: Jesse Hill Jr. Drive is closed in front of the hospital due to construction. Please follow the lighted detour signs to the parking deck.

Butler Street Parking Deck is located at 92 Jesse Hill Jr. Drive SE and is attached to the Main Grady campus. The deck is open 24 hours a day; seven days a week. Enter the parking deck on Jesse Hill Jr. Drive. Parking is $1 for every 20 minutes – up to a maximum of $6 per 24-hour period. Pay upon exit using cash, credit or debit card.
